data: CARD SURG Systemic Heparin Infusion For Impella (Module)
Do not start systemic heparin infusion until PTT is sub-therapeutic (less than 50 seconds)
Notify provider before starting heparin infusion

Discontinue previous heparin, low molecular weight heparin, rivaroxaban, dabigatran, apixaban, fondaparinux and edoxaban orders.  Discontinue intramuscular injections.   If possible, avoid non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDS)
Total heparin units/hour must account for BOTH the amount of heparin in the PURGE solution AND the rate of SYSTEMIC heparin
No IM injections while on heparin infusion
